title: ikanE thaaLajaalanuraa
sahitya:
ikanE tALajAlanurA nannintaDi sOdana sEyakarA guhA



anupallavi



 sukhaprada sukumAra sundara shikhi vAhana shaNmukhA dayAsAgarA



caraNam



 paramArthamagu ninnu bhajiyinci vEDitE paritApamulEka parihasincitivi

 sharaNAgatavanA sAdhu sangAvanA harikEsha tanayA hari bAginEyA
